price: Kandi ko nta cyo umuntu azabona (ku munsi w’imperuka) usibye ibyo yashyizemo umuhate,
arabic: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-an laysa lil'insāni illā mā saʿā
